channel.title: Upcoming meetups & hands-on mangOH sessions in Paris and London
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
This short message to let you know that after Cambridge 2 weeks ago, we are having more hands-on mangOH sessions planned in Paris and near London in the coming weeks. If you're around, we'll be delighted to welcome you!
* **May-11** in Paris at Ionis361 (tonight!): http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/OpenHardw-re-Paris/events/230659619/ * **May-19** in Paris at Mozilla premices: http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/OpenHardw-re-Paris/events/230988638/ * **May-25** near London: http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/Internet-of-Things-Thames-Valley/events/230394815/
Pictures of the previous events can be found [here](https://www.flickr.com/photos/20996445@N00/sets/72157665421052880/).
.Thibault.

item.title: Upcoming meetups & hands-on mangOH sessions in Paris and London
item.dc:creator: asyal

item.title: Upcoming meetups & hands-on mangOH sessions in Paris and London

item.description:
Hi everyone,

This short message to let you know that after Cambridge 2 weeks ago, we are having more hands-on mangOH sessions planned in Paris and near London in the coming weeks. If you’re around, we’ll be delighted to welcome you!

  • May-11 in Paris at Ionis361 (tonight!): http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/OpenHardw-re-Paris/events/230659619/
  • May-19 in Paris at Mozilla premices: http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/OpenHardw-re-Paris/events/230988638/
  • May-25 near London: http://www.meetup.com/fr-FR/Internet-of-Things-Thames-Valley/events/230394815/

Pictures of the previous events can be found here.

.Thibault.
